* You coach, drive change, and improve the way of working in the team and promote a culture of high performance and continuous improvement to ensure efficient ways of working, high quality releases and well tested solutions.


**To Thrive In This Role, We Believe You Have**
* Proven experience managing cross-functional teams
* A solid understanding of the full software development lifecycle (SDLC) and agile practices
* Strong problem-solving skills with a proactive approach to anticipating challenges and identifying opportunities for improvement
* Flexibility and the ability to navigate a dynamic, matrixed environment
* Excellent communication skills and fluency in English


**What We Offer**
* Opportunities to work in SEBs most prioritized initiatives.
* Empowering environment.
* Friendly and welcoming culture.
* International working environment.
* Attractive compensation and access to SEB staff banking with exclusive benefits.
* Excellent office environment and hybrid work opportunity.


**Do you want to be a part of SEB?**
 Welcome to our inclusive culture, where our shared values inspire and uplift our team. We celebrate diversity and strive to ensure every employee feels seen, heard, and valued.
   

  

 We are looking forward to your application by 2025-08-15
   

  

 Since we select candidates continuously, feel free to send in your application before the deadline. If you have questions about the position, please contact Mikael Kanrell, mikael.kanrell@seb.se.
   

  

 Due to summer vacations, we might take a little bit longer to get back to you than usual, thank you for your patience.
   

  

**Learn more about working at SEB** 
 on our Career website or through our Career podcasts.
   

  

 https://sebgroup.com/career
   

  

**https://bit.ly/SEBcareer**
 Please be aware that our final candidates undergo background checks, a process that includes for example identity control, verification of qualifications, credit checks, company engagements and criminal records checks. In some cases, we also apply random drug checks.

title: VP Technical Consulting
company_industry: Software Development and IT Services and IT Consulting
description:
At CatalystOne, we’re on a mission to deliver exceptional HR software and integrations that empower our customers to work smarter. We believe great solutions come from great collaboration, and we’re searching for a new VP Technical Consulting to lead the way. This position can be based from our Oslo or Stockholm office.
 



  





 If you’re an experienced leader who blends technical know-how with business savvy, thrives on building strong teams, and knows how to run a successful consulting business, this could be your next big move.
 



  





  





**As our new VP Technical Consulting, you’ll:** 



* Set the strategic technical direction for all aspects of Technical Consulting
* Lead and inspire a high-performing team, ensuring the right capacity, competence, and methodologies to execute on our strategic goals.
* Navigate between urgent customer demands and long-term strategic improvements.
* Act as a trusted technical partner
* Drive continuous improvement, reducing time-to-market and well as time-to-customer.
* Collaborate across CatalystOne, creating strong interfaces with other departments



  





**A Typical Day Might Include** 



* Coaching and developing team members, ensuring they’re empowered and equipped to own their work.
* Supporting your team in scoping and solving customer challenges.
* Leading strategic discussions on how to evolve our integration platform and technical consulting services.
* Acting as a technical advisor in pre-sales meetings or when complex customer issues arise.
* Following up and acting upon business aspects of the technical consulting business: actuals vs forecast from both a cost and a revenue perspective



  





**The Challenges (and Opportunities)** 



* Balancing strategic focus and operational demands: In this role, there’s a constant pull between addressing urgent customer issues and pushing forward strategic initiatives. You’ll need the judgment and resilience to navigate both.
* Nurturing a culture of continuous growth and innovation: We already have a team of people who drive their work forward independently. Your role will be to nurture and strengthen this culture, ensuring everyone feels empowered to own their contributions.
* Shaping our integration platform for scalability: We’re evolving toward more modular, reusable integrations to reduce time-to-market and speed up delivery for customers. You’ll have the chance to help steer this journey.



  





  





**What We’re Looking For** 



* Senior leadership experience in technical consulting, integration services, or a related domain.
* Background in software engineering or a technical field that enables you to confidently engage with developers and architects.
* Experience managing people and building teams in hybrid/distributed environment— focused on enabling, not controlling.
* Proven ability to lead change, inspire teams, and implement new ways of working.
* Willingness and ability to contribute hands-on when needed
* Strong business acumen, understanding how technical solutions tie into broader strategic goals.
* Knowledge of modern integration tools and modular architecture.
* Experience leveraging AI to drive efficiency and innovation, bringing cutting-edge technology into everyday processes and transforming how we work.
* Can support pre-sales in a technical context



  





  





**Why Join CatalystOne?** 



* Impact: Our integration business is a strategic pillar for CatalystOne’s growth—and it’s still in an exciting early stage.
* Opportunity to build: You’ll shape the future of how we deliver integrations, collaborating with a team known for entrepreneurship and innovative thinking.
* Culture: We value trust, ownership, and working together toward shared goals. You’ll join colleagues dedicated to delivering results while caring deeply about one another’s success.



  





  





**Benefits** 




 As well as your salary, you’ll receive:
 


* Financial and Health Security: Benefit from a comprehensive pension and insurance package, plus private healthcare.
* Your Well-being, Your Way: Take advantage of our wellness contribution to stay on top of your health.
* Tech Tools for Efficiency: Get the job done with a choice of laptop (mac / PC), mobile phone & subscription, and a home internet allowance.
* Flexible Work Setup: Hybrid for your life-work balance.
* And more location specific benefits...

CatalystOne will not pay any fees to search firms/recruiters if a candidate is submitted by a search firm/recruiter unless an agreement has been entered into with respect to the specific open position(s). Search firms/recruiters submitting resumes to CatalystOne on an unsolicited basis shall be deemed to accept this condition, regardless of any other provision to the contrary.*

title: Google Cloud Platform Engineer | SEB, Solna
description:
*SEB is more than just a bank with an IT function. We are a progressive tech company powered by innovation and fueled by collaboration. From Java to AI and everything in between, we offer you an impressive tech stack and several technology paths. Together we're innovating for a sustainable society and building the tech arena of the future, a welcoming space for everyone.*
 Join SEB’s Cloud Tribe and help shape the future of scalable, secure, and innovative products by advancing Public Cloud technologies. Take on this exciting challenge and make a real impact!
   

  

**About The Role**
 As a
 **Cloud Engineer** 
 within our Cloud Tribe, you will join a team of 25 highly engaged peers using new technology to develop and maintain services on top of Public Cloud Platforms catering for the platform’s technical Governance & Compliance. Work closely with operations, maintenance, and security of the platform. Our delivery includes guardrails, best practices, and supporting functionalities, all of which are paving the way for SEB’s developers to create a modern bank in the Clouds.
   

  

 As part of the Cloud Core Platforms, we offer a unique opportunity to be part of building the foundation of a paradigm change in banking. Being part of a multi-cloud tribe you will have the opportunity to gain skill and experience in multiple Public Cloud environments
 **.**
**To Thrive In This Position, We Believe You Have**
* Hands on experience with Google Cloud.
* Understanding other Cloud Platforms such as AWS and Azure.
* Experience with Infrastructure as Code (such as Terraform), automation and CI/CD
* Experience with TypeScript, Bash and Python.
* Understanding of logging, monitoring and observability platforms.
* Knowledge of Agile principles
* Motivation and eagerness to learn


**What We Offer**
* Entrepreneurial Scandinavian environment: work-life balance, international working environment, hybrid work model, empowering and welcoming culture
* Growth culture: extensive training and learning opportunities, local and international internal mobility possibilities, long-term stability
* Modern environment: innovative company in forefront of technology, challenging, cutting-edge work, excellent office environment, agile and modern ways of working
* Additional monetary benefits: paid seniority vacation and volunteering days, allocations to Your pension fund, profit sharing programme, and additional health insurance


**Do you want to be part of SEB?**
 Welcome to our inclusive culture, where our shared values inspire and uplift our team. We celebrate diversity and strive to ensure every employee feels seen, heard, and valued.
   

  

 Since we select candidates continuously, feel free to send in your application today via the link in this ad, but no later than
 **July the 30th, 2025.**
**Learn more about working at SEB: Technology | SEB**
 It is our fundamental belief that inclusion and diversity is crucial for our future success. We strive to have an inclusive, value-driven culture where employees feel valued, respected, and involved irrespective of who they are, what they believe or where they come from.

title: Linux Specialist
description:
**OM ROLLEN**
 Som Senior Linux-specialist är din huvudsakliga uppgift att säkerställa en stabil och säker drift av våra kunders Linux-baserade IT-infrastrukturer. Du kommer att ta ansvar för att designa, implementera, och underhålla Linux-system i en mångfald av miljöer. Ditt arbete kommer att omfatta att hantera serverkluster, virtualisering, och molntjänster samt säkerhetsaspekter för att skydda organisationens data och resurser.
   

  

**ERFARENHET OCH KUNSKAP**
* Erfarenhet och kunskap av att bygga och hantera Kubernetes-kluster
* Erfarenhet av automatiseringsverktyg som t.ex Ansible, Puppet eller Saltstack
* Erfarenhet av infrastruktur som kod (IAC) t.ex Terraform, Bash,
* Erfarenhet och kunskap i minst ett programmeringsspråk, t.ex Python
* Erfarenhet av CI/CD verktyg, exempelvis Jenkins, Teamcity, GitLab
* Kunskap om övervaknings teknologier, inklusive Prometheus och Grafana
* Erfarenhet av administration av distribuerade system som Kafka och Elasticsearch
* Kunskap om informationssäkerhet, både tekniska åtgärder och begrepp
* Erfarenhet av att bygga säkra, skalbara, pålitliga och högpresterande IT-infrastruktur.

title: Material Planner
description:
**Job Description**
**Om rollen**
 Som Material Planner hos Coherent blir du en nyckelspelare i vår logistikorganisation och arbetar nära både inköp och produktion. Ditt huvudfokus i rollen är att säkerställa att rätt material finns på rätt plats vid rätt tidpunkt genom noggrann leveransbevakning, analys av materialflöden och uppföljning i våra system. Du kommer att spela en central roll i att säkerställa stabila materialflöden och proaktivt identifiera eventuella risker i leveranskedjan.
   

  

**Konkreta arbetsuppgifter**
* Leveransbevakning och uppföljning:
+ Följa upp leveranser baserat på rapporter och analyser.
+ Identifiera och eskalera eventuella materialavvikelser.
+ Säkerställa att materialflöden matchar produktionsbehoven.

* Lageroptimering och materialtillgång:
+ Övervaka lagernivåer och säkerställa balans mellan tillgänglighet, utrymme, tillstånd och kostnadseffektivitet.
+ Analysera lagerdata och identifiera förbättringsmöjligheter.

* Systemhantering i Oracle:
+ Uppdatera och säkerställa korrekt materialstatus i systemet.
+ Arbeta med rapporter för att analysera materialflöden.

* Samordning och förbättringsarbete:
+ Samarbeta med inköp, produktion och lager för att optimera materialflödet.
+ Driva förbättringsinitiativ kopplat till materialhantering och lageroptimering.
+ Delta i projekt för att effektivisera planeringsprocesser och systemstöd.


**Om Profilen**
 I denna roll behöver du ha en analytisk förmåga och ett öga för detaljer. Du kommer att hantera stora mängder data och använda rapporter för att säkerställa att vi beställer rätt material i rätt mängd vid rätt tidpunkt. Samarbete med vår inköpare är avgörande för att säkerställa effektiva inköpsprocesser.
   

  

**Kvalifikationer och erfarenhet**
* Utbildning inom logistik, inköp eller motsvarande.
* Minst 1–2 års erfarenhet av materialplanering, logistik eller lagerstyrning inom tillverkande industri.
* Mycket goda kunskaper i svenska och engelska, både i tal och skrift.
* Starka kunskaper i Microsoft Excel.
* Erfarenhet av ERP-system, meriterande med kunskap i Oracle och/eller SAP.


**Personliga egenskaper**
* Analytisk och noggrann: Du älskar att arbeta med siffror och har en datadriven approach.
* Ägarskap och ansvar: Du tar ansvar för att hålla planeringsparametrar uppdaterade och ser till att rätt material finns tillgängligt.
* Strukturerad och lösningsorienterad: Du hanterar stora mängder information och tar initiativ till förbättringar.
* Kommunikativ och samarbetande: Du arbetar nära både inköp och produktion och ser till att alla har rätt information.


 Vi uppskattar ditt intresse för denna roll! För att vi ska kunna göra en rättvis bedömning ber vi dig att säkerställa att ditt CV och din ansökan tydligt beskriver din erfarenhet, språkkunskaper och möjlighet att arbeta på plats i Järfälla. På grund av det stora antalet ansökningar kommer vi endast att gå vidare med kandidater som tydligt matchar de angivna kraven.
   

  

**Plats:** 
 Järfälla, Stockholm
   

  

**Anställning:** 
 Tillsvidare anställning med 6 månades provanställning.
   

  

**Säkerhetskrav (Safety Requirements)**
 Alla medarbetare måste följa företagets EHS-procedurer och II-VI Corporate EHS-standarder.
   

  

**Kvalitets- Och Miljöansvar (Quality And Environmental Responsibilities)**
 Beroende på plats kan denna roll innefatta ansvar för att upprätthålla och följa ISO 9000, 9001, 14001 och/eller andra relevanta standarder kopplade till kvalitetshanteringssystemet och miljöledningssystemet.
   

  

**Engagemang för företagskulturen (Culture Commitment)**
 Vi säkerställer att företagets värderingar (
 **ICARE** 
 ) genomsyrar alla aspekter av din roll på Coherent:
   

  

* Integrity – Create an Environment of Trust (Skapa en miljö av förtroende)
* Collaboration – Innovate Through the Sharing of Ideas (Innovativa lösningar genom delade idéer)
* Accountability – Own the Process and the Outcome (Ta ansvar för processen och resultatet)
* Respect – Recognize the Value in Everyone (Se värdet i varje individ)
* Enthusiasm – Find a Sense of Purpose in Work (Hitta mening och drivkraft i arbetet)


**Vi erbjuder**
* En dynamisk och internationell arbetsmiljö
* En uppskattande och kollegial företagskultur
* Unika tekniska utmaningar för framtidens produkter
* Förmåner som ligger över branschsnittet


**About Us**
 Coherent is a global leader in lasers, engineered materials and networking components. We are a vertically integrated manufacturing company that develops innovative products for diversified applications in the industrial, optical communications, military, life sciences, semiconductor equipment, and consumer markets. Coherent provides a comprehensive career development platform within an environment that challenges employees to perform at their best, while rewarding excellence and hard-work through a competitive compensation program. It's an exciting opportunity to work for a company that offers stability, longevity and growth. Come Join Us!
   

  

**Note to recruiters and employment agencies:** 
 We will not pay for unsolicited resumes from recruiters and employment agencies unless we have a signed agreement and have required assistance, in writing, for a specific opening.

title: Data Engineer
description:
We are looking for a Data Engineer to our retail client.
   

  

**Start:** 
 2025-08-04
   

  

**Length:** 
 2026-01-31
   

  

**Location:** 
 On-site in Stockholm 2-3 days per week
   

  

**Responsibilities:**
* Take end-to-end responsibility to build, optimize and support of existing and new data products towards the defined target vision
* Be a champion of DevOps mindset and principles and able to manage CI/CD pipelines and terraform as well as Cloud infrastructure, in our context, it is GCP (Google Cloud Platform).
* Ensure that our built data products work as independent units of deployment and non-functional aspects of the data products follow the defined standards for security, scalability, observability, and performance.
* Work close to the Product Owner and other stakeholders around vision for existing data products and identifying new data products to support our customer needs
* Work with product teams within and outside our domain around topics that relate to the data mesh concept.
* Evaluate and drive continuous improvement and reducing technical debt in the teams
* Maintain expertise in latest data/analytics and cloud technologies


**Qualifications:**
* Passion for Data, people, and technology
* At least 4+ year’s work experience including hands-on as Data engineer on Google Cloud Platform (GCP)
* Experience in GCP tools – Dataflow and Bigquery
* Experience in Data Build Tool (DBT)
* Experience in different data formats (Avro, Parquet)
* Experience in data query languages (SQL or similar)
* Experience in data centric programming using one of more programming languages Python, Java /or Scala.
* Good understanding of different data modelling techniques and trade-off
* Knowledge of NoSQL and RDBMS databases
* Have a collaborative and co-creative mindset with excellent communication skills
* Motivated to work in an environment that allows you to work and take decisions independently
* Experience in working with data visualization tools
* Fluent in English both written and verbal


**Advantage if you also have:**
* Business understanding of retail industry

title: Sports Marketing Manager
company_industry: Manufacturing, Retail, and Sporting Goods Manufacturing
description:
**Sports Marketing Manager | Sweden**
 Join adidas Europe and shape the future of the sporting goods industry! For over 75 years, our European heritage has been a fusion of culture and innovation, driving global sports trends. Our offices, from Herzogenaurach to London, Berlin, Zaragoza, Amsterdam, Warsaw, Athens, Milan, Manchester, and Paris, are centers of creativity and collaboration. We aim to be Europe's best sports brand, seeking pioneers and visionaries to join our bold journey.
   

  

 At adidas, you're not just getting a job; you're invited to make a global impact, joining a team that values creativity, courage and innovation. Are you ready to be part of our journey?
   

  

 As our Sports Marketing Manager at adidas, you will be at the forefront of building a powerful sports community in the Nordics. Your role will involve signing and nurturing key partnerships with organizations like the Swedish Athletic Association and Marathon Gruppen, as well as identifying and supporting the next generation of sports icons and rising talents. You will implement impactful global strategies locally, ensuring adidas’s presence is inspiring and relevant in the running and outdoor scenes.
   

  

 The position is based in Stockholm, and you will report to your Line Manager based in our Nordic HQ in Solna, Sweden.
   

  

 You will be one of 6 Nordic Team members in the Sports Marketing team in Nordics.
   

  

 Our Nordic Headquarters in our brand-new office in Solna, where we have nearly 100 colleagues working across Sales, Marketing, and support functions. The Nordics is part of our North Europe Cluster
 **,** 

 bringing together the Nordics, UK, and Benelux as one team. We’re a workforce united through a common passion for Sport and Fashion, as well as working in an environment where everyone feels comfortable to be their true authentic self.
   

  

**What You’ll Do**
 As a Sports Marketing Manager at adidas, you will lead sports partnerships, sign new athletes and organizations, and manage athlete portfolios. You will execute global strategies locally, coordinate and be responsible for key events like the adidas Stockholm Marathon and managing Swedish Athletic Association. You’ll build relationships with athletes, agents, and partners, oversee budgets and spend, and track performance using reporting tools. Your work ensures adidas’s strong presence in Nordic sports and to maximize brand and business growth. If you’re passionate about sports, marketing, and building strong athlete relationships, this is your opportunity to make a significant impact.
   

  

**Skills You’ll Need**
* Fluent Swedish and English is necessary; another Nordic language would be beneficial.
* Advanced Excel, PowerPoint and Business objects skills.
* Analytical and problem-solving skills
* Flexibility to handle multiple tasks simultaneously and to work under pressure
* Solution-oriented with a focus on achieving results


**Life At Adidas**
 We have an optional “Sports Hour” every Thursday @ 11-12 and an annual fitness allowance.
   

  

 We offer a performance related bonus, 30 days holiday, flexible bank holidays (swap up to 3 bank holidays per year for other days of leave), private health insurance &, generous employee discount, public gym & pool facilities.
   

  

 To ensure everyone feels welcome we endeavour to accommodate everyone at all stages of the application and interview process. Should you need it, please let your recruitment partner know and they will be more than happy to help.
   

  

**Please apply with an English version of your CV before our closing date of 22.07.25**
**Please note, we may close this role early if we receive a high volume of strong applications, therefore we encourage you to apply as soon as possible if you’re interested.**
 adidas celebrates diversity, supports inclusiveness and encourages individual expression in our workplace. We do not tolerate the harassment or discrimination toward any of our applicants or employees. We are an equal opportunity employer.

title: Solution Architect
description:
Scania is undergoing a transformation from being a leading supplier of trucks, buses, and engines to providing complete and sustainable transport solutions. Together with TRATON and our sister brands MAN, Volkswagen Truck & Bus, and International, we are working to shape the future of mobility with innovative and environmentally conscious solutions. Our values – customer first, respect, team spirit, responsibility, and elimination of waste – are at the heart of everything we do. Together, we are at the forefront of creating a sustainable future.
   

  

**Role Summary**
**Join Scania's IT Transformation Journey**
 Scania is embarking on an exciting transformation from a traditional truck manufacturer to a provider of comprehensive sustainable transport solutions. We are seeking a talented and passionate Solution Architect to join our dynamic team and play a crucial role in this transformation.
   

  

**About The Role**
 As a Solution Architect, you’ll be at the heart of our global system landscape—connecting the dots between business needs and technical solutions. You’ll influence strategic decisions, modernise legacy systems, and design innovative solutions that power our operations worldwide.
   

  

 What We Expect
   

  

 We are looking for someone who thrives on collaboration and communication since you will work closely with stakeholders, developers, and users, as well as the broader architect community. Understanding strategic direction, business requirements and processes is essential, with a focus on structuring IT solutions.
   

  

**Job Responsibilities**
 What you will do
   

  

  

* Drive some of the most high-impact initiatives within Scania and TRATON Logistics.
* Shape global IT solutions that align with business goals and market trends.
* Translate complex requirements into clear, structured IT architectures.
* Use modelling tools and frameworks to communicate your vision effectively.
* Collaborate across all levels—from developers to senior stakeholders—to ensure alignment and clarity.
* Champion long-term thinking while delivering practical, scalable solutions.
* Challenge the status quo and help us work smarter, not harder.


**Who You Are**
 You’re a natural collaborator with a strategic mindset and a passion for technology. You bring:
   

  

  

* Proven experience in architectural roles within global organisations.
* An agile mindset and a proactive, solution-oriented approach.
* Broad technical skills preferably within IT—ideally with a background in system development or analysis.
* Deep understanding of modern architecture, integration technologies, and secure development practices.
* Knowledge of the logistics domain and how IT can drive operational excellence.
* Excellent communication skills in English (written and spoken).
* Bonus: Experience with cloud-based solutions.


**This Is Us**
 You’ll join a diverse and agile team of project managers, architects, developers, and service managers. We value open dialogue, shared ownership, and continuous learning. With strong support from our offshore delivery team, we’re scaling up to meet tomorrow’s challenges—together.
   

  

**Scania Offers**
 We offer a dynamic, flexible workplace with hybrid work options, including Scania Sergel and Midway hubs. With a structured development plan and courses, Scania supports your career growth both locally and internationally.
   

  

 Benefits include training at our health center Gröndal or wellness allowance, result bonus, flexible hours, and company car leasing. Scania also hosts events for employees and their families, and Stockholm residents enjoy direct access to Södertälje via Scania Job express buses.
   

  

**Application**
 Your application should include a CV and any relevant certificates. We welcome all applicants and strive for diversity in our recruitment processes.Apply as soon as possible, no later than 2025-08-15. Screening will take place mainly after the application period. Logical and personality tests may be used as part of the selection process, and a background check may be required for this role.
   

  

 If you have questions or would like more information, please contact:
   

  

 group manager Jessica Fjällkeborn, jessica.fjallkeborn@scania.com
   

  

 Please note that due to the summer vacation period, responses to questions may take longer than usual, and interviews will be scheduled after the holidays
 **.**
**We look forward for your application!**

title: Systemförvaltare
description:
Vill du göra riktig skillnad varje dag? På Ragn-Sells är det exakt det vi gör, oavsett vilken position du har. Vi är ett familjeföretag i tredje generationen med erfarenheten i ryggen och blicken mot morgondagens innovationer. Hos oss får du vara med och forma en cirkulär framtid där vi minskar behovet av att bryta nya råvaror och istället använder det vi redan har – om och om igen.
   

  

 Vi söker nu en Systemförvaltare till vårt team som består av 12 förvaltare. Vi hanterar förvaltningsobjekt inom hela Ragn-Sells koncernen och drivs alla av Ragn-Sells värdeord, vi tror på enkla lösningar, är ansvarstagande och har en framåtanda och helhetssyn på organisationen.
   

  

**Vi erbjuder dig**
* Arbete inom en av Sveriges viktigaste branscher
* En trevlig naturnära arbetsplats med bra och kompetenta kollegor
* Goda anställningsvillkor med 30 dagar semester och möjlighet till flextid samt kollektivavtal, pension och friskvårdsbidrag m.m.
* Kompetensutvecklingsmöjligheter genom vår egen akademi


**Ansvar och arbetsuppgifter**
 Som systemförvaltare hos Ragn-Sells arbetar du med att utifrån ett IT-perspektiv samordna och driva förvaltningen av ett eller flera affärsobjekt som i sin tur innehåller ett eller flera system eller moduler. I tätt samarbete med affärens motpart i förvaltningen ser vi till att säkerställa utveckling av systemstöd i enlighet med företagets affärskrav och vår IT-strategi.
   

  

 En central del av rollen är att ansvara för konfiguration, utveckling och förvaltning av vår SharePoint-miljö. Du implementerar bästa praxis för att säkerställa en effektiv och användarvänlig plattform för Ragn-Sells koncern, samarbetar nära team inom verksamheten för att säkra ett enkelt och effektivt arbetssätt i Microsoft Teams och andra Microsoft 365-tjänster. Du har också kontakt med vår support- och driftsorganisation för att säkerställa en stabil användarsupport och löpande förvaltning.
   

  

**Din profil**
 Vi söker dig som har avslutad eftergymnasial utbildning, gärna inom IT/teknik, eller motsvarande erfarenhet som vi bedömer som likvärdig. Du har erfarenhet av systemförvaltning, gärna i enlighet med PM3, och en djup förståelse för SharePoint-funktionalitet och arkitektur.
   

  

 Vi ser gärna att du har erfarenhet av att arbeta i komplexa Microsoft 365-miljöer och har god kunskap om Teams och dess integration med övriga tjänster. Har du dessutom erfarenhet av ledningssystem är det meriterande. Certifieringar såsom Microsoft Certified: SharePoint Administrator är ett plus, men inget krav.
   

  

 Eftersom arbetet är både varierande och utmanande behöver du ha en god förmåga att anpassa dig till nya uppgifter och arbetssätt. Du kommunicerar tydligt och professionellt på både svenska och engelska, i tal och skrift.
   

  

**Ansökan och kontakt**
 Vi arbetar med löpande urval, så vänta inte med att skicka in din ansökan. Personligt brev är inget krav för att söka tjänsten, besvara däremot gärna urvalsfrågorna så gott du kan. Frågor om tjänsten besvaras av Head of IT Maintenance Andreas Lundström på andreas.lundstrom@ragnsells.com,
   

  

 Ragn-Sells är ett av Sveriges främsta kompetensföretag inom återvinning och miljö. Vi samlar in, behandlar och återvinner avfall och restprodukter från näringsliv, organisationer och hushåll över hela Sverige. Våra erfarna och professionella medarbetare tror på enkla lösningar, ansvarstagande, helhetssyn och framåtanda. Vi är drygt 1600 medarbetare i Sverige. Ragn-Sells koncernen finns dessutom i Norge, Danmark och Estland.

title: Customer Technology Advisor Security
job_function: Sales, Business Development, and Customer Service
description:
**Who We Are**
 At Kyndryl, we design, build, manage and modernize the mission-critical technology systems that the world depends on every day. So why work at Kyndryl? We are always moving forward – always pushing ourselves to go further in our efforts to build a more equitable, inclusive world for our employees, our customers and our communities.
   

  

**The Role**
 Join our dynamic team as a
 **Security Customer Technology Advisor** 
 and become an integral part of our cutting-edge Go-To-Market team. As a certified expert in your field, you will be at the forefront of revolutionizing technology solutions for our valued customers. Working hand in hand with our Kyndryl Consult Partners and customer partners, you will leverage your technical and solution expertise to drive targeted opportunities and exceed customer expectations.
   

  

 In this role, you won't just be another advisor; you will be a trusted ally and visionary, delivering unique and differentiated value to our customers. Through captivating show-and-tell methods such as engaging demos and compelling presentations, you will showcase our credibility and eminence in the industry, leaving a lasting impression on potential customers.
   

  

 As a vital member of our team, you will support Consulting, Advisory, and Architecture activities across Sales, Pre-Sales & Delivery, collaborating closely with Customer Partners and Kyndryl Consult Partners. With your extensive technical knowledge and mastery of the security domain, you will bring together the breadth of Kyndryl's expertise to develop profitable deals that drive our success.
   

  

 Your dedication to continuous improvement and your passion for our security practice will shine through as you showcase your end-to-end knowledge of the domain you align with, as well as the associated subdomains. Your technical prowess, backed by your external certifications, will establish you as a true authority in your field.
   

  

 As a
 **Security Customer Technology Advisor** 
 , you will possess strong technical and business acumen, allowing you to provide value driven solutions within the security practice services domain(s). Your exceptional customer facing skills, combined with your articulate communication style and interpersonal finesse, will enable you to effortlessly convey the technical benefits of Kyndryl's capabilities, perfectly matching the unique needs of each customer.
   

  

 As a strategic thinker, you will identify the intricate business and technical requirements of our customers, leveraging the vast capabilities of Kyndryl to generate winning cross-practice solutions. Your ability to develop and deliver compelling demonstrations, proof of concepts, and prototypes will clearly demonstrate the tangible value our offerings bring to our customers, leaving them eager to partner with us.
   

  

 In addition to your technical expertise, you will also take the lead in coordinating the entire pre-sales process, ensuring quality and compliance verification while adhering to Kyndryl best practices. Your collaboration with internal and external stakeholders will generate winning responses and create optimal technical solutions. Moreover, you will actively build and nurture relationships with our external alliance partners, fostering a collaborative environment where joint solutions are co-created.
   

  

 Join our team of forward thinking, tech-savvy professionals and embark on a journey of innovation, growth, and fulfillment. As a
 **S** 
**ecurity Customer Technology Advisor,** 
 you will not only shape the future of technology solutions but also make a meaningful impact on the success of our customers and Kyndryl as a whole.
   

  

 Your Future at Kyndryl
   

  

 Every position at Kyndryl offers a way forward to grow your career. We have opportunities that you won’t find anywhere else, including hands-on experience, learning opportunities, and the chance to certify in all four major platforms. Whether you want to broaden your knowledge base or narrow your scope and specialize in a specific sector, you can find your opportunity here.
   

  

**Who You Are**
 You’re good at what you do and possess the required experience to prove it. However, equally as important – you have a growth mindset; keen to drive your own personal and professional development. You are customer-focused – someone who prioritizes customer success in their work. And finally, you’re open and borderless – naturally inclusive in how you work with others.
   

  

**Required Skills And Experience**
* Deep domain knowledge of Services offerings and technical solutions in the security practice
* Demonstrated experience translating distinctive technical knowledge into actionable customer insights and solutions
* Prior consultative selling experience
* Externally recognized as an expert in the technology and/or solutioning areas, including technical certifications supporting subdomain focus area(s) including: Application Data and AI; Cloud; Core Enterprise and zCloud; Digital Workplace; Network and Edge; Security and Resiliency


**Preferred Skills And Experience**
* Bachelor's degree or Master’s degree
* 5 years of experience (minimum) selling technical services for multi-industry customers


**Being You**
 Diversity is a whole lot more than what we look like or where we come from, it’s how we think and who we are. We welcome people of all cultures, backgrounds, and experiences. But we’re not doing it single-handily: Our Kyndryl Inclusion Networks are only one of many ways we create a workplace where all Kyndryls can find and provide support and advice. This dedication to welcoming everyone into our company means that Kyndryl gives you – and everyone next to you – the ability to bring your whole self to work, individually and collectively, and support the activation of our equitable culture. That’s the Kyndryl Way.
   

  

**What You Can Expect**
 With state-of-the-art resources and Fortune 100 clients, every day is an opportunity to innovate, build new capabilities, new relationships, new processes, and new value. Kyndryl cares about your well-being and prides itself on offering benefits that give you choice, reflect the diversity of our employees and support you and your family through the moments that matter – wherever you are in your life journey. Our employee learning programs give you access to the best learning in the industry to receive certifications, including Microsoft, Google, Amazon, Skillsoft, and many more. Through our company-wide volunteering and giving platform, you can donate, start fundraisers, volunteer, and search over 2 million non-profit organizations. At Kyndryl, we invest heavily in you, we want you to succeed so that together, we will all succeed.
   

  

**Get Referred!**
 If you know someone that works at Kyndryl, when asked ‘How Did You Hear About Us’ during the application process, select ‘Employee Referral’ and enter your contact's Kyndryl email address.

title: Director, Rapidly Growing Technology Investor, Stockholm, Sweden
company_industry: Venture Capital and Private Equity Principals
description:
**About Our Client**
 Our client is a pan-European technology focused private equity investor investing across both services and software. They have built an enviable track record with their latest fundraising and realisations. With ambitions to grow their Nordic capabilities, they are now looking to add a seasoned investment professional to help build out the Nordic investment team in Stockholm.
   

  

**What the job involves**
* Work on all aspects of the transaction process from origination, deal structuring, negotiation, execution, portfolio management, and realisation
* Make investment decisions with a high degree of autonomy, and work closely with other senior team members across the fund


**Who we are looking for**
* Prior private equity experience is essential, with experience in a high performing environment developing analytical skills and commercial acumen
* A growing track record of successful technology deals in a deal captain capacity
* Other backgrounds in leading organisations may also be relevant, especially technology led ones
* Excellent academics including a degree at Bachelor or Master's level
* A credible and engaging presentational style, coupled with the confidence to be effective in relationship building with vendors / management teams and advisers
* High level of numeracy and technical proficiency, combined with the commercial awareness to put the numbers into their strategic context; and
* A demonstrable interest in investing in high growth technology businesses, coupled with a genuine interest in understanding underlying market and business dynamics

title: Courier
description:
We have an exciting opportunity for you to join our team of Couriers.
   

  

**Who We Are**
 FedEx is the largest express transportation company in the world, connecting more than 220 countries and territories. We work every moment to deliver the most important package of someone’s day. Our team of passionate people know their day-to-day work is invaluable in delivering outstanding experience to our customers. 530,000 team members strong, we are as diverse as the world we serve. We love what we do, and we do it well. Our reach is big, and so are our dreams. Join us and let's write our next chapter together.
   

  

**What You Will Be Doing**
* Representing FedEx in front of our customers, courteously picking up and delivering their packages
* Driving vehicles in FedEx fleet on defined routes in various postcodes, making sure customers’ packages get to the right place, on time
* Making sure vehicles are always operated safely and legally
* Following all FedEx Health and Safety and other company policies and procedures


**What Do You Bring With You**
* Be a reliable team player
* Be energetic and enthusiastic
* Have a strong customer focus
* Have good communication skills
* Have an eye for detail to make sure paperwork is correct
* Holding a valid driving license for type of vehicle assigned is essential and held for 2+ years would be an advantage.
* Adaptability to external driving conditions and circumstances is required
* Commercial driving experience would be an advantage
* Basic geographical knowledge
* Manual Drivers license


**What Do We Offer**
* Attractive compensation package
* Training to get you started and on-the-job learning opportunities
* Extensive learning resources to further develop your skills and knowledge
* Tuition Assistance Program (\*applicable for FedEx positions with a permanent contract)
* Employee Assistance Program for you and your family in difficult life situations
* Employee reduced-rate shipping
* Great career opportunities
* FedEx is one of the worlds most admired companies and trusted brands year after year


 Bring your ideas, individuality, and dreams to our global community. Feel good about where you work. Choose your career path - we’re ready to invest in your development. Join FedEx.
   

  

 FedEx was built on a philosophy that puts people first, one we take seriously. We are an equal opportunity employer and we are committed to a diverse and inclusive workforce in which we provide growth opportunities for all
   

  

 Our Company
   

  

 FedEx is one of the world's largest express transportation companies and has consistently been selected as one of the top 10 World’s Most Admired Companies by "Fortune" magazine. Every day FedEx delivers for its customers with transportation and business solutions, serving more than 220 countries and territories around the globe. We can serve this global network due to our outstanding team of FedEx team members, who are tasked with making every FedEx experience outstanding.
   

  

 Our Philosophy
   

  

 The People-Service-Profit philosophy (P-S-P) describes the principles that govern every FedEx decision, policy or activity. FedEx takes care of our people; they, in turn, deliver the impeccable service demanded by our customers, who reward us with the profitability necessary to secure our future. The essential element in making the People-Service-Profit philosophy such a positive force for the company is where we close the circle, and return these profits back into the business, and invest back in our people. Our success in the industry is attributed to our people. Through our P-S-P philosophy, we have a work environment that encourages team members to be innovative in delivering the highest possible quality of service to our customers. We care for their well-being, and value their contributions to the company.
   

  

 Our Culture
   

  

 Our culture is important for many reasons, and we intentionally bring it to life through our behaviors, actions and activities in every part of the world. The FedEx culture and values have been a cornerstone of our success and growth since we began in the early 1970’s. While other companies can copy our systems, infrastructure and processes, our culture makes us unique and is often a differentiating factor as we compete and grow in today’s global marketplace.

title: Systemutvecklare
description:
Brinner du för utveckling och letar efter en ny spännande och meningsfull utmaning? Hos Amendo Tech får du chansen att arbeta i framkant inom systemutveckling för några av Sveriges mest spännande företag. Just nu söker vi drivna och lösningsorienterade specialister för kommande uppdrag inom bank och finans, detaljhandel, myndigheter, produktbolag och snabbväxande startups. Vi erbjuder unika möjligheter för dig som är redo för en ny, stimulerande utmaning.
   

  

 Din kompetens & profil
   

  

 Du är erfaren inom systemutveckling och bekväm med både front- och backend, redo att skapa lösningar som gör skillnad. Vi letar efter dig som är nyfiken, engagerad och som trivs med att arbeta på varierande uppdrag.
   

  

 Vi söker dig som har erfarenhet av att arbeta med några av dessa teknologier:
   

  

**Frontend**
* JavaScript/TypeScript: Gedigen kunskap inom modern JavaScript/TypeScript.
* Ramverk: Erfarenhet av ramverk som React, Vue eller Angular.
* HTML & CSS: Stark grund inom HTML5 och CSS3, gärna även erfarenhet av Bootstrap eller Tailwind.
* State Management: Kunskaper i bibliotek som Redux eller Vuex.


**Backend**
* Programmeringsspråk: Erfarenhet av språk som Node.js, Java, C#, Python eller Go.
* API-design: Skicklighet i att utveckla och designa RESTful API, gärna även GraphQL.
* Databaser: Kunskap i både relationsdatabaser (t.ex. PostgreSQL, MySQL) och NoSQL (t.ex. MongoDB, Redis).
* Säkerhet: Erfarenhet av säkerhetsprinciper och autentisering som OAuth, JWT eller SAML.


**DevOps och Infrastruktur**
* Molnplattformar: Erfarenhet av molntjänster som AWS, Azure eller Google Cloud Platform.
* CI/CD: Kunskap om CI/CD med verktyg som Jenkins, GitLab CI eller GitHub Actions.
* Containrar: Erfarenhet av Docker och gärna även Kubernetes.
* Versionshantering: Flytande i Git och vana vid Git-baserade arbetsflöden.


**Övrigt**
* Testning: Kunskap i testautomatisering, både frontend och backend (t.ex. Jest, Mocha, JUnit, Selenium).
* Agilt arbete: Erfarenhet av Scrum eller Kanban.
* Kommunikation och samarbete: Förmåga att arbeta effektivt i team och bidra till kunskapsutbyte.


 Du har en vilja, nyfikenhet och drivkraft att vilja skapa nytta hos kunden samt lära dig nytt. En problemlösare som inte är rädd för att ta initiativ och vågar utforska nya vägar och arbetssätt. Du har en förmåga att snabbt sätta dig in i nya sammanhang och processer. Du får saker gjorda och ser kunskapsluckor som en möjlighet för personlig utveckling. Du är analytisk och har stor förståelse för vikten av service och kommunikation.
   

  

 Som konsult kommer du att ställas inför en rad olika utmaningar, både från ett socialt och pragmatiskt perspektiv. Därför tror vi att du är öppen och ödmjuk för både förändring och olikheter. Du har ett agilt sätt att möta problem och kan se dem från olika vinklar.
   

  

 Om Amendo Tech
   

  

 Amendo Tech är din heltäckande partner inom IT och tech. Som vår konsultkollega blir du en del av ett personligt bolag som lägger stor vikt vid kompetens, mångfald och innovation. Vi ser varje medarbetares unika perspektiv som en styrka, och vi erbjuder ett öppet klimat där vi stöttar dig att nå dina mål. Tillsammans bidrar vi till att forma en bättre framtid genom teknik och kreativitet.
   

  

 Vi är ett expansivt bolag med stark lokal närvaro i Stockholm samt i sydvästra och norra Sverige. Följ Amendo Tech på Linkedin!
   

  

 Amendo Tech är en del av Amendo Group som har arbetat med framtidens kompetens sedan 2001. I koncernen ingår även Amendo Bemanning & Rekrytering och Lagotto Executive Search & Interim. Tillsammans möter vi dig där du står, och tar dig dit du vill. Vi är din engagerade och trygga kompetenspartner.
   

  

 Frågor och kontakt
   

  

 Vid frågor eller funderingar om våra konsultuppdrag är du varmt välkommen att höra av dig till Amendo Techs Kiara Bergqvist på kiara.bergqvist@amendotech.se eller Johanna Hallenberg på johanna.hallenberg@amendotech.se. Vi ser fram emot att höra från dig, varmt välkommen med din ansökan!
   

  

 #IT

title: Senior Microsoft 365 Tekniker
description:
*Zelly är ett ledande ”born-in-the-cloud” företag . Vi utvecklar och optimerar molntjänster från Microsoft och ser till att våra kunder har tillgång till de bäst lämpade molntjänsterna för deras verksamhet.*
 Zelly är en ledande Microsoft-partner som hjälper företag att lyckas med sin digitala transformation. Vi tror på kraften i Microsofts ekosystem och hur det kan skapa verklig affärsnytta genom smarta synergier. Som Microsoftpartner har vi fått förtroendet att driva flera viktiga kunduppdrag, något som också uppmärksammats genom flertalet utmärkelser från Microsoft. För oss är det ett kvitto på att vi är på rätt väg och att vårt arbete skapar ett värde. Vi är specialiserade på molntjänster och nu söker vi en Senior Microsoft 365 tekniker till vårt Modern Workplace team.
   

  

**Om rollen**
 Som Senior Microsoft 365 Tekniker på Zelly kommer du ansvara för att designa och implementera lösningar som stärker kunders verksamhet, både tekniskt och affärsmässigt. Från strategi till genomförande designar och implementerar du intelligenta arbetsplatslösningar i Microsoft 365-ekosystemet, lösningar som stärker samarbete, skyddar information och driver innovation.
   

  

**Dina huvudsakliga ansvarsområden**
* Designa och implementera intelligenta arbetsplatslösningar inom Microsoft 365
* Skapa säkra, skalbara och efterlevnadsanpassade arkitekturer
* Samarbeta nära både IT och verksamhet för att omvandla affärsbehov till hållbara tekniska lösningar
* Presentera arkitekturval och vägval för såväl tekniska som icke-tekniska intressenter
* Optimera befintliga lösningar med fokus på prestanda, kostnad och användarupplevelse
* Hålla dig uppdaterad om Microsofts produktutveckling och branschens bästa praxis


**Vi Söker Dig Som Har**
* Minst 5 års erfarenhet av att arbeta inom Microsoft 365-ekosystemet
* Enhet och-applikationshantering (Intune)
* Microsoft Säkerhetskoncept (Microsoft 365 Defender)
* Microsoft Samarbetsplattform (Teams, Exchange Online, m.fl.)
* Informationsskydd och efterlevnad (Microsoft Purview)
* Erfarenhet av lösningsdesign, strategi, migreringar och implementationer
* Erfarenhet av automatisering och effektivisering med PowerShell, Power Platform och Microsoft Graph API
* Stark kommunikativ förmåga och vana vid att hantera olika intressenter
* Talar och skriver obehindrat på svenska och engelska


**Som Person Är Du**
* Självständig och drivande
* Teamplayer
* Strukturerad och metodisk i ditt arbetssätt
* Analytisk och lösningsorienterad
* Relationsskapande och pedagogisk i din kommunikation
* Van vid att arbeta i team och dela kunskap


**Dina Möjligheter Hos Oss**
* Bra villkor och stora utvecklingsmöjligheter i ett snabbt expanderande IT-bolag!
* Möjlighet till delägarskap i Aderian Group som är koncernen som Zelly ingår i
* Då vårt mål är att du ska bli bäst på molntjänster betalar vi gärna för din fortbildning. För när du utvecklas – utvecklas vi!
* Roliga resor och aktiviteter tillsammans!


 Rekrytering sker löpande där tillträde och lön sker enligt överenskommelse. Vi kommer genomföra bakgrundkontoroll som en del av rekryteringsprocessen. Känns detta som en tjänst för dig? Skicka in din ansökan redan idag så kontaktar vi dig så snart som möjligt.
   

  

 Hoppas att vi hörs!

title: Program Manager
description:
**Period from:** 
 2025-09-01
   

  

**Period to:** 
 2027-06-30
   

  

**Location:** 
 On-site in Stockholm
   

  

 Program Manager for Warehouse Project.
   

  

* Develop roadmaps and plans in line with overall program targets
* Identify risks, dependencies and act on those accordingly
* Foster a collaborative environment across cross-functional teams

 Technical Skills
